intent_atoms.description: Provide a signed distribution plan for the isoinspect CLI that aligns with app release cadence and includes notarized macOS binaries, Homebrew-style tap publication, and Linux artifact delivery.
Decision record must outline macOS notarized ZIP/DMG, Homebrew tap, and Linux packaging recommendations with signing implications.
Updated release checklist tasks and automation hooks necessary to ship CLI artifacts alongside app releases, including storage locations and checksum policies.
Risk assessment for each distribution channel (licensing, tooling prerequisites, update cadence) with mitigation steps and owner hand-offs captured in the research output.
CLI build and notarization steps must be audited and recorded to determine reuse or adjustments for standalone distribution.
Define artifact naming, storage layout, and checksum publication rules so QA and release engineering can confirm binary provenance during go/no-go reviews.

functional_units.name: CLI Build Automation
functional_units.description: Automates building the ISOInspectorCLI product using swift build in release configuration

functional_units.name: Notarization Script
functional_units.description: Runs scripts/notarize_app.sh to notarize macOS CLI binaries and packages

functional_units.name: Artifact Packaging
functional_units.description: Creates signed ZIP or DMG distributions for macOS CLI

functional_units.name: Homebrew Tap Publication
functional_units.description: Publishes a Homebrew formula for the macOS CLI into a tap repository

functional_units.name: Linux Packaging Pipeline
functional_units.description: Builds and packages the CLI for Linux, supporting static/dynamic builds and package manager releases

functional_units.name: Checksum Generation
functional_units.description: Generates checksums for all released artifacts to verify integrity

functional_units.name: Release Checklist Integration
functional_units.description: Adds tasks and automation hooks to the release checklist for CLI artifact shipping

functional_units.name: Distribution Decision Record
functional_units.description: Documents recommended distribution channels, signing, and packaging choices
